title: Average price for a full set of acrylics at nail salons in the U.S. 2006 to 2019
summary: In general Average price in U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Average price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Average price in U.S. dollars, about 45.29 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum Average price in U.S. dollars about 38.41 was reached at Year 2016
